revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Form Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
{{{info|page name= Summary Timeline}}}
{{{for template|Summary Timeline}}} '''EVA Title:''' {{{field|EVA Title|input type=text|size=50|placeholder=FHRC EVA 1 Version B}}} The output of this form will be saved to a page entitled " Summary Timeline" (it will add "Summary Timeline"). '''Depends on''': {{{field|Depends on|list|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=SpX-5, US EVA 27}}} '''Related Articles:''' {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} '''EVA Duration (HH:MM):''' {{{field|EVA Duration hour|size=2|default=6}}} : {{{field|EVA Duration minute|size=2|default=30}}} '''Color Key:''' If you use the color feature for a task, briefly describe what that color indicates here.
Red{{{field|Color Red Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Orange{{{field|Color Orange Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Yellow{{{field|Color Yellow Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Green{{{field|Color Green Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Blue{{{field|Color Blue Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Purple{{{field|Color Purple Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Pink{{{field|Color Pink Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Gray{{{field|Color Gray Meaning|input type=text|size=40}}}
Actor 1 Actor 2 Actor 3
Actor name:{{{field|Actor 1 name|input type=text|size=10|placeholder=IV}}} Actor name:{{{field|Actor 2 name|input type=text|size=10|placeholder=EV1}}} Actor name:{{{field|Actor 3 name|input type=text|size=10|placeholder=EV2}}}
Check to include in compact view:{{{field|Actor 1 Display in Compact View|input type=checkbox|default=no}}} Check to include in compact view:{{{field|Actor 2 Display in Compact View|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}} Check to include in compact view:{{{field|Actor 3 Display in Compact View|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}}
Check to enable get-ahead calculator:{{{field|Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads|input type=checkbox|default=no}}} Check to enable get-ahead calculator:{{{field|Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}} Check to enable get-ahead calculator:{{{field|Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads|input type=checkbox|default=yes}}}
{{{field|Actor 1 Tasks|holds template}}} {{{field|Actor 2 Tasks|holds template}}} {{{field|Actor 3 Tasks|holds template}}}
{{{end template}}} {{{for template|Actor 1 Task|multiple|label=Actor 1 Task|embed in field=Summary Timeline[Actor 1 Tasks]|add button text=Add Task}}} Task Title: {{{field|Title|input type=text|class=full-width|placeholder=Task Title}}} Duration (H:M):
{{{field|Duration hour|size=1|default=0}}}:{{{field|Duration minute|size=2|default=00}}}
Color: {{{field|Color|input type=dropdown|values=red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,pink,gray|default=gray|mandatory}}} Related articles: {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} Details: {{{field|Free text|input type=textarea|rows=1|class=full-width|autogrow|placeholder=Type full task details here}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Actor 2 Task|multiple|label=Actor 2 Tasks|embed in field=Summary Timeline[Actor 2 Tasks]|add button text=Add Task}}} Task Title: {{{field|Title|input type=text|class=full-width|placeholder=Task Title}}} Duration (H:M):
{{{field|Duration hour|size=1|default=0}}}:{{{field|Duration minute|size=2|default=00}}}
Color: {{{field|Color|input type=dropdown|values=red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,pink,gray|default=gray|mandatory}}} Related articles: {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} Details: {{{field|Free text|input type=textarea|rows=1|class=full-width|autogrow|placeholder=Type full task details here}}} {{{end template}}} {{{for template|Actor 3 Task|multiple|label=Actor 3 Tasks|embed in field=Summary Timeline[Actor 3 Tasks]|add button text=Add Task}}} Task Title: {{{field|Title|input type=text|class=full-width|placeholder=Task Title}}} Duration (H:M):
{{{field|Duration hour|size=1|default=0}}}:{{{field|Duration minute|size=2|default=00}}}
Color: {{{field|Color|input type=dropdown|values=red,orange,yellow,green,blue,purple,pink,gray|default=gray|mandatory}}} Related articles: {{{field|Related article|class=full-width no-links-allowed|values from namespace=Main|list|placeholder=Related articles}}} Details: {{{field|Free text|input type=textarea|rows=1|class=full-width|autogrow|placeholder=Type full task details here}}} {{{end template}}} == Free text == {{{standard input|free text|rows=0}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}} This is the "Summary Timeline" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Summary Timeline}} [[Category:Form Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
For the compact version (default): 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Compact }}
To force the compact version to a fixed pixel width to fit on a specific page: 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Compact | 123 }}
For the full version: 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Full }}
[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] {{#summary-timeline: | format={{{2|}}} | fixedwidth={{{3|}}} | st index={{#counter: SummaryTimeline }} | title={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?EVA title }}@@@{{{1|}}} | depends on={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Depends on }} | Parent Related Article={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Related article }} | EVA Duration hours={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Duration hour }} | EVA Duration minutes={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Duration minute }} | Actor 1 name = {{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Actor 1 name }} | Actor 2 name = {{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Actor 2 name }} | Actor 3 name = {{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Actor 3 name }} | Actor 1 Display in Compact View = {{#show: {{{1|}}} |?Actor 1 Display in Compact View }} | Actor 2 Display in Compact View = {{#show: {{{1|}}} |?Actor 2 Display in Compact View }} | Actor 3 Display in Compact View = {{#show: {{{1|}}} |?Actor 3 Display in Compact View }} | Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads = {{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads }} | Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads = {{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads }} | Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads = {{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads }} | Actor1={{#ask: [[From page::{{{1|}}}]] [[Assigned to::Actor1]] | ?#=FromPage |mainlabel=- |?Index=Index |?Has text title=Title |?Duration hour=Duration hour |?Duration minute=Duration minute |?Depends on#list=Depends on |?Related article=Related article |?Color=Color |?Free text=Free text |?Actor |named args=yes |format=template |template=ST Query Result |sort=Assigned to, Index }} | Actor2={{#ask: [[From page::{{{1|}}}]] [[Assigned to::Actor2]] | ?#=FromPage |mainlabel=- |?Index=Index |?Has text title=Title |?Duration hour=Duration hour |?Duration minute=Duration minute |?Depends on#list=Depends on |?Related article=Related article |?Color=Color |?Free text=Free text |?Actor |named args=yes |format=template |template=ST Query Result |sort=Assigned to, Index }} | Actor3={{#ask: [[From page::{{{1|}}}]] [[Assigned to::Actor3]] | ?#=FromPage |mainlabel=- |?Index=Index |?Has text title=Title |?Duration hour=Duration hour |?Duration minute=Duration minute |?Depends on#list=Depends on |?Related article=Related article |?Color=Color |?Free text=Free text |?Actor |named args=yes |format=template |template=ST Query Result |sort=Assigned to, Index }} | Color Gray Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Gray Meaning }} | Color Red Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Red Meaning }} | Color Orange Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Orange Meaning }} | Color Yellow Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Yellow Meaning }} | Color Blue Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Blue Meaning }} | Color Green Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Green Meaning }} | Color Pink Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Pink Meaning }} | Color Purple Meaning={{#show: {{{1|}}} | ?Color Purple Meaning }} }}

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
Use this format: 
{{Actor 1 Task
|Title=
|Duration=
|Color=
|Related articles=
|Free text=
}}

{{Task
|Actor={{{Actor 1 name|}}}
|Title={{{Title|}}}
|Duration hour={{{Duration hour|}}}
|Duration minute={{{Duration minute|}}}
|Color={{{Color|}}}
|Related article={{{Related article|}}}
|Free text={{{Free text|}}}
}}
[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] {{#set_internal:Task |Index={{#counter: Actor1 }} |Actor={{#var:Actor1name}} |Has text title={{{Title|}}} |Assigned to#list=Actor1 |Duration={{{Duration hour|00}}}:{{{Duration minute|00}}} |Duration hour={{{Duration hour|00}}} |Duration minute={{{Duration minute|00}}} |Duration in minutes={{#expr: (({{{Duration hour|0}}} * 60) + {{{Duration minute|0}}}) }} |Related article#list={{{Related article|}}} |Color={{{Color|}}} |Free text={{{Free text|}}} |From page={{FULLPAGENAME}} |EVA title={{#var:EVATitle}} |Parent related article#list={{#var:pageRelatedArticle}} |EVA Duration={{#var:EVADurationHour}}:{{#var:EVADurationMinute}} }} &&&{{{Title|}}}@@@{{{Duration hour|}}}@@@{{{Duration minute|}}}@@@{{{Related article|}}}@@@{{{Color|}}}@@@{{{Free text|}}}

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text: <noinclude> [[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] </noinclude><includeonly> &&&{{{?Title|}}}@@@{{{?Duration hour|}}}@@@{{{?Duration minute|}}}@@@{{{?Related article|}}}@@@{{{?Color|}}}@@@{{{?Free text|}}} </includeonly>

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
This is the "Summary Timeline" template. It should be called by using the Summary Timeline form. Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] {{#vardefine:EVATitle|{{{EVA Title|}}}}} {{#vardefine:pageRelatedArticle|{{#arraymap:{{{Related article|}}}|,|x|[[x]]}}}} {{#vardefine:EVADurationHour|{{{EVA Duration hour|}}}}} {{#vardefine:EVADurationMinute|{{{EVA Duration minute|}}}}} {{#vardefine:DependsOn|{{{Depends on|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorGrayMeaning|{{{Color Gray Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorRedMeaning|{{{Color Red Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorOrangeMeaning|{{{Color Orange Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorYellowMeaning|{{{Color Yellow Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorBlueMeaning|{{{Color Blue Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorGreenMeaning|{{{Color Green Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorPinkMeaning|{{{Color Pink Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorPurpleMeaning|{{{Color Purple Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:Actor1name|{{{Actor 1 name|Actor 1}}}}} {{#vardefine:Actor2name|{{{Actor 2 name|Actor 2}}}}} {{#vardefine:Actor3name|{{{Actor 3 name|Actor 3}}}}} {{#set: EVA Title = {{{EVA Title|}}} }} {{#set: Duration hour = {{{EVA Duration hour|}}} }} {{#set: Duration minute = {{{EVA Duration minute|}}} }} {{#set: Depends on = {{{Depends on|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 1 name = {{{Actor 1 name|Actor 1}}} }} {{#set: Actor 2 name = {{{Actor 2 name|Actor 2}}} }} {{#set: Actor 3 name = {{{Actor 3 name|Actor 3}}} }} {{#set: Actor 1 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 1 Display in Compact View|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 2 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 2 Display in Compact View|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 3 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 3 Display in Compact View|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }} == Extension Output == To display the output on another page, use the following template: Compact version: {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} }} Compact version with fixed pixel width (change "400"): {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Compact | 400 }} Full version: {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Full }} {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} }} {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Full }} == Raw Template Output == {{{EVA Title|}}} ({{{EVA Duration hour|}}}:{{{EVA Duration minute|}}}) Gray:{{{Color Gray Meaning|}}} Red: {{{Color Red Meaning|}}} Orange:{{{Color Orange Meaning|}}} Yellow:{{{Color Yellow Meaning|}}} Blue:{{{Color Blue Meaning|}}} Green:{{{Color Green Meaning|}}} Pink:{{{Color Pink Meaning|}}} Purple:{{{Color Purple Meaning|}}}
{{#var:Actor1name|Actor 1}} {{#var:Actor2name|Actor 2}} {{#var:Actor3name|Actor 3}}
{{{Actor 1 Tasks|}}} {{{Actor 2 Tasks|}}} {{{Actor 3 Tasks|}}}
{{#arraymap:{{{Depends on|}}}|,|x|[[Depends on::x]]}} {{#arraymap:{{{Related article|}}}|,|x|[[Related article::x]]}} {{#set: Color Gray Meaning={{{Color Gray Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Red Meaning={{{Color Red Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Orange Meaning={{{Color Orange Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Yellow Meaning={{{Color Yellow Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Blue Meaning={{{Color Blue Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Green Meaning={{{Color Green Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Pink Meaning={{{Color Pink Meaning|}}}}} {{#set: Color Purple Meaning={{{Color Purple Meaning|}}}}} [[Category:Summary Timeline]]
